text:
Radius AI | Backend Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Full-Time | Onsite | radiusai.com

RadiusAI is an early-stage startup that is helping brick & mortar retailers provide a level of experience that surpasses online experiences through AI and video analytics.

Our backend tech stack includes both cloud and edge computing. We process video data with deep learning models in Python at the edge to generate real-time data for our app. We also run big data technologies in the cloud such as Spark and Snowflake to generate analytics for clients.

Apply here https://radius-ai.workable.com/j/50DFBBD92C
